result.eng: The number of university students is growing.
result.ga: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid
result.orig: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid
result.html: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méidThe number of university students is growing.

result.eng: Membership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.
result.ga: Tá dhá euro ar bhallraíocht do mhic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do pháistí óga
result.orig: Tá dhá euro ar bhallraíocht do mhic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do pháistí óga
result.html: Tá dhá euro ar bhallraíocht do mhic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do pháistí ógaMembership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá euro ar ḃallraíoċt do ṁic léinn agus tá sé saor in aisce do ṗáistí ógaMembership for students is two euros, and it is free for young children.

result.eng: Are you students in the National University of Ireland, Galway?

result.eng: Gráinne and I are post-graduate students. What about you?

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin

result.ponchtml: Lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí Mohammad Atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas Ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ĠearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
